类 AbstractMcrypt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buession.security.mcrypt.AbstractMcrypt
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Mcrypt
    直接已知子类:
    AESMcrypt, Base64Mcrypt, DESMcrypt, DiscuzMycrypt, MD5Mcrypt, Sha1Mcrypt, Sha256Mcrypt, Sha512Mcrypt, ShaMcrypt

    public abstract class AbstractMcrypt
extends Object
implements Mcrypt
    对象加密通用方法
